name: Memory
description: Persistent memory storage using knowledge graph structures.
full_description: Allow your agent to maintain 'long-term memory' across different chat sessions. This server implements a knowledge graph where the agent can store entities, observations, and relationships, making it possible to recall facts about the user, projects, or past decisions.

tools.name: create_entities
tools.description: Create new entities in the knowledge graph.

tools.name: add_observations
tools.description: Add new observations to existing entities.

tools.name: search_nodes
tools.description: Search for entities based on content.

tools.name: open_nodes
tools.description: Retrieve specific entities and their relationships.
